/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it. The street itself is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban setting. A few buildings can be seen in the background, their architecture hinting at the city's blend of traditional and modern styles. On the right side of the street, there's a tunnel, its entrance marked by a yellow and black striped sign. The image is captured from a low angle, giving a sense of depth and perspective to the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees and bushes contrasting beautifully with the blue sky.
